title: Control and Death Stranding Lead The BAFTAs - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.03.20
description:
Blessing and Imran talk about the BAFTAs along with new Half Life: Alyx gameplay.

Time Stamps - 
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
Barrett’s The Legend of Zelda In Review comes out TODAY: https://youtu.be/SftdpUVXQLA 
The Roper Report   -
00:08:54 - The BAFTA nominees have been announced
00:14:30 - “I noticed one really odd choice…” - Charles Jakobsen
00:18:00 - Valve dropped some Half Life Alyx gameplay
00:33:26 - The ESA says they’ll move ahead with E3 2020 despite coronavirus concerns
00:37:05 - “Do y'all think they're stuck in a position where they CAN'T cancel E3?” - Ricky Mcflyy
00:42:21 - Marvel has announced a new open world RPG
00:44:10 - “What do y'all think mobile games need to do to break into the public conscience in a positive way?” - Ricky Mcflyy
00:46:31 - If you love cheap-ass Platinums like Greg, great news…
00:47:56 - Out today
00:51:40 -  “Ad”  
 Reader mail   -
00:53:32 - “What's the likelihood (% wise) we get Part 2 and Part 3 of the FF7 Remake in the next 6 years?” - Jonathan Arleo
00:58:03 - “The number of devs who were unaware they were on GeForce now suggests no efforts were made to contact smaller developers. Is this wrong?” - Jamie S
01:04:12 - Squad Up: Gary - Steam - RealZombro
01:05:16 - You‘re Wrong
01:10:38 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Whitta
